title: Number of lobbyists in the U.S. 2000 to 2019
summary: In general Number of lobbyists has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of lobbyists is roughly constant from 2003 to 2004, slightly increasing from 2004 to 2006, and finally slightly decreasing from 2006 to 2011.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2004 and 2005.
The highest Number of lobbyists, of value 14825.0 was reached at Year 2007
Minimum Number of lobbyists about 12607.0 was reached at Year 2011
